Client Information.question_text: What is your date of birth?
Do you require special accommodations due to a disability?
Are you court-ordered to attend this screening?
If yes, name the referring court or agency.
What is the charge or reason for referral?
What is your AZ Driver’s License/I.D. number?
What is the DUI violation date?

Legal History.question_text: Check all that apply, including your current situation:

options.label: Domestic Violence or family disturbances (including those not resulting in arrest)

additional_field.placeholder: Provide a description of the circumstances.

options.label: Other Legal Issues (Diversion, Incarceration, Probation, Parole)

Behavioral Health Treatment History.question_text: Behavioral Health Treatment and Behavioral Health Hospitalization History:

MAST.question_text: Do you enjoy a drink now and then?
Do you feel you are a normal drinker or drug user? ('Normal' means drinking or using less than or about the same as most other people and not getting into recurring trouble while drinking or using.)

additional_fields.placeholder: Enter when you last felt you were a normal drinker or user

MAST.question_text: Have you ever awakened after drinking or drug use and found that you could not remember a part of what happened?
Does anyone worry or complain about your drinking or drug use?

additional_fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the person(s) who worries

MAST.question_text: Can you stop drinking or drug use without a struggle after one or two drinks or uses?
Do you feel guilty about your drinking or drug use?

additional_fields.placeholder: Describe how often you feel guilty

MAST.question_text: Do friends or relatives think you are a normal drinker or drug user? ('Normal' means no problems caused by drinking or drug use.)
Are you able to stop drinking or drug use when you want to?
Have you ever attended a meeting of Alcoholics Anonymous or other 12-step meetings (e.g., AA, NA, CA)?
Have you gotten into physical fights when you have been drinking or using drugs?
Has your drinking or drug use ever created problems between you and your parents, another relative, spouse, girlfriend, or boyfriend?
Has any family member ever sought help for your drinking or drug use?
Have you ever lost friends because of your drinking or drug use?
Have you ever gotten into trouble at work or school because of drinking or drug use?
Have you ever lost your job because of drinking or drug use?
Have you ever neglected your obligations (school, work, family) for two or more days in a row because you were drinking or using drugs?
Do you drink or use drugs before noon fairly often?
Have you ever been told you have liver trouble, such as cirrhosis?
After heavy drinking or drug use, have you ever had severe shaking or heard voices/seen things that weren’t there?
Have you ever gone to someone (e.g., education or treatment) for help with your drinking or drug use?
Have you ever been in a hospital because of drinking or drug use?
Have you ever been hospitalized in a psychiatric ward where drinking or drug use contributed to the problem?
Have you ever sought help from a clinic, doctor, social worker, or clergy for an emotional problem involving drinking or drug use?
Have you ever been cited or arrested for DUI or other drug/alcohol-related offenses?

Part A.question_text: 1) Have you had 3 or more alcohol/drug-related arrests/citations?
2) Was your blood alcohol level .15 or above?
3) Do you habitually abuse or have a problem controlling alcohol or drugs?
4) Do you feel you have a problem with alcohol/drugs?
5) Have you been diagnosed with substance abuse or organic brain disease due to substance abuse?
6) Have you experienced any of these withdrawal symptoms?
7) Have you been medically diagnosed as having any of these complications?

Part B.question_text: 2) Blood alcohol level or influencing drug when cited/arrested
3) Have you had two alcohol/drug-related arrests/citations?
4) Have you ever lost time from work or school due to alcohol or drug use?
5) Have you had any problems with family, friends or peers due to your alcohol/drug use?
6) Have you ever gone to a DUI class, Alcohol/Drug class, medical facility, or treatment center because of your alcohol/drug use?
7) Have you ever had any memory loss after alcohol/drug use?
8) Have you ever passed out (become unconscious) after drinking/drug use?
9) Have you experienced any of these after alcohol/drug use?

subquestions.question_text: Shakes or malaise relieved by drinking/using
Nausea (e.g., the next day after drinking)

Part B.question_text: 10) Have you used alcohol/drugs to cope with or escape from problems/stress?
11) Have you experienced an increase of use, a change of tolerance (e.g., BAC >= .18) or change in pattern of use?
12) Have you ever had dramatic personality changes after alcohol/drug use?
Part B.followup: If yes, explain when and how often:

A_B_I.question_text: 1) Have you attended class or a program for anger or destructive behavior? (do not include domestic violence)
2) Have you been cited, arrested or charged for threatening someone, property damage, assault or other aggressive acts? (do not include domestic violence acts)
3) Do your feelings build up so that you feel like exploding?
4) Do you get mad easily or have an explosive temper?
5) Do people tell you to calm down?
6) Do you sometimes feel so angry you could lose control?
7) Do you hit, kick, punch, destroy or throw things when you are very upset?
8) Has your anger caused problems for your family or friends?
9) Do you get into arguments or fights even when you do not want to?
10) Have you lost time at work or school or lost friend because of your temper?

T_V_I.question_text: 1) Have you experienced or witnessed a life-threatening or terrifying event?
2) Have you witnessed or experienced physical, emotional or sexual abuse?
3) Have you been, or witnessed kidnapping, beating, shooting, stabbing, threatening, or any other form of victimization?
4) Have you witnessed or experienced months of ongoing intense emotional distress?
5) Have you received medical, psychiatric, psychological, or counseling treatment for any items 1 through 4?

additional_fields.field_name: Are you satisfied with the treatment result?

additional_fields.placeholder: Indicate if additional help is needed

T_V_I.question_text: 6) If you answered yes to any of the questions 1 through 4, please explain how you coped or will cope with the experience.
T_V_I.placeholder: Describe how you coped or plan to cope

S_I.question_text: 1) Has life become very painful or unbearable?
2) Do you feel overwhelming pain, distress, or depression?
3) Do you feel that life is not worth living?
4) Have you thought of hurting yourself or killing yourself?
5) Have you ever made any plans to hurt or kill yourself?
6) Have you ever attempted to hurt or kill yourself?
7) Do you want to hurt or kill yourself now?
8) Do you have a plan about how to hurt or kill yourself?
9) If you answered 'yes' to any question above, please describe how you coped or will cope with the situation:
S_I.placeholder: Explain how you coped or plan to cope

D_I.question_text: 1) Do you feel undeserving or worthless?
2) Do you feel very lonely, abandoned, and/or isolated?
3) Do you often feel sad, depressed, or down in the dumps?
4) Do you feel hopeless about your future?
5) Has your sleep been restless lately?
7) Do you feel your life is a failure lately?
8) Do you feel you just can’t get going?
10) Are you very angry with yourself?
11) If you answered 'yes' to any question above, except #6, please describe how you coped or will cope with the situation:
D_I.placeholder: Explain how you coped or plan to cope

V_I.question_text: 1) The conflict that brought me to this screening involved which of the following, to the other person:
options: A minor injury with complete recovery in a few days
Injury with complete recovery in a few weeks
Injury with complete recovery in a few months

L_O_F.question_text: 1) My actions during the conflict involved the following:
options: Physical contact or threat of contact (push, hold, slaps, restrain, block movement)
Physical force or threat of force (hit, punch, kick, bite, etc)
Weapon display or threat of weapon use (club, knife, gun, etc)
Weapon use, choking or forced sex

L_O_F.question_text: 2) The other person's actions during the conflict involved the following:
options: Physical contact or threat of contact (push, hold, slaps, restrain, block movement)
Physical force or threat of force (hit, punch, kick, bite, etc)
Weapon display or threat of weapon use (club, knife, gun, etc)
Weapon use, choking or forced sex

H_I.question_text: 1) Was there a time when you were often in fights?
2) Do you feel you must control others or be in charge?
3) Do you like to carry a weapon for protection or to feel powerful?
4) Do you feel so hurt that you have the right to hurt someone?

additional_fields.placeholder: Enter who you feel like hurting

H_I.question_text: 5) Are you going to pursue, follow, or stalk someone?

additional_fields.placeholder: Enter the person you might pursue

H_I.question_text: 6) Are you angry enough to hit or harm someone?
7) Are you seeking revenge with someone?

additional_fields.placeholder: Enter who you seek revenge with

H_I.question_text: 8) Are you going to confront someone verbally?

additional_fields.placeholder: Enter who you plan to confront

H_I.question_text: 9) Are you going to confront someone with force or a weapon?

additional_fields.placeholder: Enter who you plan to confront

H_I.question_text: 10) Are you going to harm someone?

additional_fields.placeholder: Enter who you plan to harm

D_V_P_I.question_text: 1) Have you ever been cited, arrested, or charged for a domestic violence offense or received an order for protection that restricted your actions?
2) Have you attended or been referred to a domestic violence offender treatment program, including today?
3) Have you ever been so angry that you threatened, restrained, hit, shoved, or kicked your partner or a family member?
4) Do your conflicts usually follow a pattern of tension building, followed by a blow-up and then a peaceful time?
7) Do you control others for their own good or to protect them?
8) Do you feel you could lose control and abuse or assault your partner or family member?
9) Do you use anger, intimidation, or threats to control your partner or family member?
10) Do you ever feel calm and composed when you are angry or during conflicts?
